001package csv2html;
002
003import java.io.BufferedWriter;
004import java.io.File;
005import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
006import java.io.FileOutputStream;
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
009import java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException;
010import java.util.Calendar;
011import utility.StringUtility;
012
013/**
014 * ライタ：情報のテーブルをHTMLページとして書き出す。
015 */
016public class Writer extends IO
017{
018        /**
019         * ライタのコンストラクタ。
020         * @param aTable テーブル
021         */
022        public Writer(final Table aTable)
023        {
024                super(aTable);
025
026                return;
027        }
028
029        /**
030         * HTMLページを基にするテーブルからインデックスファイル(index.html)に書き出す。
031         */
032        public synchronized void run()
033        {
034                try {
035                        final Attributes attributes = this.attributes();
036                        final String fileStringOfHTML = attributes.baseDirectory() + attributes.indexHTML();
037                        final File aFile = new File(fileStringOfHTML);
038                        final FileOutputStream outputStream = new FileOutputStream(aFile);
039                        final OutputStreamWriter outputWriter = new OutputStreamWriter(outputStream, StringUtility.encodingSymbol());
040                        final BufferedWriter aWriter = new BufferedWriter(outputWriter);
041                        this.writeHeaderOn(aWriter);
042                        this.writeTableBodyOn(aWriter);
043                        this.writeFooterOn(aWriter);
044                        aWriter.close();
045                }
046                catch (UnsupportedEncodingException | FileNotFoundException anException) { anException.printStackTrace(); }
047                catch (final IOException anException) { anException.printStackTrace(); }
048
049                return;
050        }
051
052        /**
053         * 属性リストを書き出す。
054         * @param aWriter ライタ
055         */
056        public void writeAttributesOn(final BufferedWriter aWriter)
057        {
058                try {
059                        aWriter.write("\t\t\t\t\t\t");
060                        aWriter.write("<tr>\n");
061                        attributes().names().forEach(aString -> {
062                                try {
063                                        aWriter.write("\t\t\t\t\t\t\t");
064                                        aWriter.write("<td class=\"center-pink\"><strong>");
065                                        aWriter.write(aString);
066                                        aWriter.write("</strong></td>\n");
067                                } catch (final IOException iOException) { iOException.printStackTrace(); }
068                        });
069                        aWriter.write("\t\t\t\t\t\t");
070                        aWriter.write("</tr>\n");
071                } catch (final IOException iOException) { iOException.printStackTrace(); }
072
073                return;
074        }
075
076        /**
077         * フッタを書き出す。
078         * @param aWriter ライタ
079         */
080        public void writeFooterOn(final BufferedWriter aWriter)
081        {
082                final Calendar calendar = Calendar.getInstance();
083                final int year = calendar.get(1);
084                final int month = calendar.get(2) + 1;
085                final int day = calendar.get(5);
086                final int hour = calendar.get(11);
087                final int minute = calendar.get(12);
088                final int second = calendar.get(13);
089                StringBuffer stringBuffer = new StringBuffer();
090                stringBuffer.append(" on ");
091                stringBuffer.append(String.format("%1$04d", new Object[] { Integer.valueOf(year) }));
092                stringBuffer.append("/");
093                stringBuffer.append(String.format("%1$02d", new Object[] { Integer.valueOf(month) }));
094                stringBuffer.append("/");
095                stringBuffer.append(String.format("%1$02d", new Object[] { Integer.valueOf(day) }));
096                final String aDate = stringBuffer.toString();
097                stringBuffer = new StringBuffer();
098                stringBuffer.append(" at ");
099                stringBuffer.append(String.format("%1$02d", new Object[] { Integer.valueOf(hour) }));
100                stringBuffer.append(":");
101                stringBuffer.append(String.format("%1$02d", new Object[] { Integer.valueOf(minute) }));
102                stringBuffer.append(":");
103                stringBuffer.append(String.format("%1$02d", new Object[] { Integer.valueOf(second) }));
104                final String aTime = stringBuffer.toString();
105                try {
106                        aWriter.write("\t\t\t\t\t</tbody>\n\t\t\t\t</table>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t</tr>\n\t</tbody>\n</table>\n<hr>\n<div class=\"right-small\">Created by AOKI Atsushi, IKEDA Keisuke, ENOMOTO Yoshiki, SHIZUNO Tomoya, TSUJI Karin and FUKUI Kosuke (CSV2HTML written by Java)" + aDate + aTime + "</div>\n</body>\n</html>\n");
107                } catch (final IOException iOException) { iOException.printStackTrace(); }
108
109                return;
110        }
111
112        /**
113         * ヘッダを書き出す。
114         * @param aWriter ライタ
115         */
116        public void writeHeaderOn(final BufferedWriter aWriter)
117        {
118                try {
119                        aWriter.write("<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN\" \"http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd\">\n<html lang=\"ja\">\n<head>\n<meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" content=\"text/html; charset=UTF-8\">\n<meta http-equiv=\"Content-Style-Type\" content=\"text/css\">\n<meta http-equiv=\"Content-Script-Type\" content=\"text/javascript\">\n<meta name=\"keywords\" content=\"Java, PL, Project\">\n<meta name=\"description\" content=\"" + super.attributes().titleString() + " \"> \n<meta name=\"author\" content=\"AOKI Atsushi, IKEDA Keisuke, ENOMOTO Yoshiki, SHIZUNO Tomoya, TSUJI Karin and FUKUI Kosuke \">\n<link rev=\"made\" href=\"http://www.cc.kyoto-su.ac.jp/~atsushi/\">\n<link rel=\"index\" href=\"index.html\">\n<style type=\"text/css\">\n<!--\nbody {\n\tbackground-color : #ffffff;\n\tmargin : 20px;\n\tpadding : 10px;\n\tfont-family : serif;\n\tfont-size : 10pt;\n}\na {\n\ttext-decoration : underline;\n\tcolor : #000000;\n}\na:link {\n\tbackground-color : #ffddbb;\n}\na:visited {\n\tbackground-color : #ccffcc;\n}\na:hover {\n\tbackground-color : #dddddd;\n}\na:active {\n\tbackground-color : #dddddd;\n}\ndiv.belt {\n\tbackground-color : #eeeeee;\n\tpadding : 0px 4px;\n}\ndiv.right-small {\n\ttext-align : right;\n\tfont-size : 8pt;\n}\nimg.borderless {\n\tborder-width : 0px;\n\tvertical-align : middle;\n}\ntable.belt {\n\tborder-style : solid;\n\tborder-width : 0px;\n\tborder-color : #000000;\n\tbackground-color : #ffffff;\n\tpadding : 0px 0px;\n\twidth : 100%;\n}\ntable.content {\n\tborder-style : solid;\n\tborder-width : 0px;\n\tborder-color : #000000;\n\tpadding : 2px 2px;\n}\ntd.center-blue {\n\tpadding : 2px 2px;\n\ttext-align : center;\n\tbackground-color : #ddeeff;\n}\ntd.center-pink {\n\tpadding : 2px 2px;\n\ttext-align : center;\n\tbackground-color : #ffddee;\n}\ntd.center-yellow {\n\tpadding : 2px 2px;\n\ttext-align : center;\n\tbackground-color : #ffffcc;\n}\n-->\n</style>\n<title>" + super.attributes().titleString() + "</title>\n</head>\n<body>\n<div class=\"belt\">\n<h2>" + super.attributes().captionString() + "</h2>\n</div>\n<table class=\"belt\" summary=\"table\">\n\t<tbody>\n\t\t<tr>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t\t<table class=\"content\" summary=\"table\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<tbody>\n");
120                } catch (final IOException iOException) { iOException.printStackTrace(); }
121
122                return;
123        }
124
125        /**
126         * ボディを書き出す。
127         * @param aWriter ライタ
128         */
129        public void writeTableBodyOn(final BufferedWriter aWriter)
130        {
131                this.writeAttributesOn(aWriter);
132                this.writeTuplesOn(aWriter);
133
134                return;
135        }
136
137        /**
138         * タプル群を書き出す。
139         * @param aWriter ライタ
140         */
141        public void writeTuplesOn(final BufferedWriter aWriter)
142        {
143                
144                final Integer aInteger[] = { 0 };
145                super.tuples().forEach(aTuple -> {
146                        try{
147                                aWriter.write("\t\t\t\t\t\t");
148                                aWriter.write("<tr>\n");
149                                aTuple.values().forEach(aString -> {
150                                        try {
151                                                aWriter.write("\t\t\t\t\t\t\t");
152                                                if (aInteger[0] % 2 == 0) {
153                                                        aWriter.write("<td class=\"center-blue\">");
154                                                } else {
155                                                        aWriter.write("<td class=\"center-yellow\">");
156                                                }
157                                                aWriter.write(aString);
158                                                aWriter.write("</td>\n");
159                                        } catch (final IOException iOException) { iOException.printStackTrace(); }
160                                });
161                                aWriter.write("\t\t\t\t\t\t");
162                                aWriter.write("</tr>\n");
163                                aInteger[0]++;
164                        } catch (final IOException iOException) { iOException.printStackTrace(); }
165                });
166                
167                return;
168        }
169}
